text: Ahaziah1:2. Ahab's son who had succeeded him as king of Israel. had fallen through the lattice-work1:2. Lattice-work: perhaps the shade used to cover a window. of his upper room in Samaria and had hurt himself badly. So he sent out messengers, telling them: “Go and ask Baal-zebub, the god of Ekron, whether I will get better from this injury.”
